name: As the light flickers.
description:
A Touhou fangame made for the Touhou Pride Game Jam 4 where you answer questions to escape from a yokai.

I don't know too much about Touhou so instead of using official characters I decided to create my own and put them in the Touhou universe, also,  if I got anything wrong please let me know and I'll fix it.

CONTROLS:

Select : (Z / W / Y) on keyboard | (A) on controler | (left click) on mouse

Cancel: (X) on keyboard | (X) on controler | (right click) on mouse

Exit to menu: (Esc) on keyboard | (Y) on controler

REMEMBER: The controler controls might be different depending on the controler you have.
